sourcesContent:
import { StatusBar } from 'react-native'
import { createNativeStackNavigator } from '@react-navigation/native-stack'
import { NavigationContainer } from '@react-navigation/native'
import CharDetailScreen from './src/screens/char-detail'
import MainScreen from './src/screens/main-screen'
import EpisodeDetailScreen from './src/screens/episode-detail'
import LocationDetailScreen from './src/screens/location-detail'
import LoginPage from './src/screens/login'
import { UserProvider } from './src/contexts/userContext'
import ThemeScreen from './src/screens/theme'

const Stack = createNativeStackNavigator()

export default function App() {
  return (
    <UserProvider>
    <NavigationContainer>
      <Stack.Navigator initialRouteName="Login">
        <Stack.Screen name="Login" component={LoginPage} options={{headerRight: () => <ThemeScreen />,}} />
        <Stack.Screen name="Main" component={MainScreen} options={{headerRight: () => <ThemeScreen />,}} />
        <Stack.Screen name="CharDetail" component={CharDetailScreen} options={{headerRight: () => <ThemeScreen />,}} />
        <Stack.Screen name="EpisodeDetail" component={EpisodeDetailScreen} options={{headerRight: () => <ThemeScreen />,}} />
        <Stack.Screen name="LocationDetail" component={LocationDetailScreen} options={{headerRight: () => <ThemeScreen />,}} />
      </Stack.Navigator>
      <StatusBar style="auto" />
    </NavigationContainer>
    </UserProvider>
  )
}
